name: Dont push the button
description:
This small game will show you how easily you can break your brain. Block, reverse and unlock your skills, dodge traps . Are u good on that? Then share screenshots/videos of your time-records in comments and compare it with another people. I will add your result and nickname in the description  if you will be the best at it . 

And just have fun. 

Current records:

lvl 1:  7.878  - LukaSH
l2:  5.941 - Ki0laN
l3:  20.754 - LukaSH
l4:  08.102  - Ki0laN
l6:  14.702 - LukaSH
l7: 1:30:390 - LukaSH
l8: 24.799 - Ki0laN
l9: - 15.570 - Ki0laN
----------
lvl 0 and 5 are tutorial levels.
